name: Ideal
description:
Ideal was my terrible  attempt on creating  megaman battle network style clone. It's a short game that finishes around 10-20 minutes, I think.

This game was made during for RMN's Theme Roulette 3, in which the three assets must be included in the game are:
Pic:Frogge's mad picture
Word: Ideals
Resource: Mirak's font

Other resources used from another resource event.
Mirak's monster(Cat)
KatanaHiroshi's monster(Blue Void), gameover
Waka's Berry Portrait
TheRPGMakerAddict's berry monster
JustAShyDoge(me)'s monster(butterfly), animation.

Graphics by Ansimuz, specifically warped city art set, city background and player.

Projectile, magic shoots by XYEzawr
